text: Yvette Diane Clarke (born November 21, 1964) is an American politician. She has been the U.S. representative for New York's 9th congressional district since 2013. She is a member of the Democratic Party. Before, she represented the New York's 11th congressional district from 2007 until 2013. Clarke was a member of the New York City Council from 2002 to 2006. Clarke was born in Flatbush, Brooklyn, on November 21, 1964, to Lesley Clarke and former city councilwoman Una Clarke, both immigrants from Jamaica. ==References== ==Other websites== * Congresswoman Yvette Clarke official U.S. House website * Yvette Clarke for Congress * Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from New York (state) Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Yvette Clarke
